decks.notes: The deck focuses on aggressive, quick creature plays with a combination of burn spells and pump effects to overwhelm the opponent. It aims to maintain board presence and deal direct damage to the opponent while using cards like Guide of Souls and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer to generate card advantage. The inclusion of Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury helps to further boost the aggression and close out games quickly. The deck also includes removal spells like Galvanic Discharge and Thraben Charm to handle threats from the opponent. The mana base is streamlined for consistency and speed.

The deck focuses on using cheap creatures and counterspells to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. By using cards like Coiling Oracle and Ice-Fang Coatl to generate card advantage and tempo, the deck aims to maintain control of the game while ramping up into powerful threats like Abhorrent Oculus and Shardless Agent. With the ability to protect its key cards with counterspells like Flare of Denial and Force of Negation, the deck can quickly overwhelm opponents and secure a win through efficient aggression and disruption.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on fast, aggressive creatures coupled with burn spells to quickly close out the game. The key concept is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, while also using burn spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment to deal direct damage to the opponent or remove blockers. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Voice of Victory provide additional support and buffs to the team, while cards like Static Prison and Thraben Charm help control the opponent's board. The deck aims to win the game quickly and efficiently through a combination of creature damage and burn spells.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize the Simic color combination to generate mana quickly and efficiently through cards like Birthing Ritual. This allows for playing multiple spells in a turn and overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures such as Coiling Oracle and Shardless Agent. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Force of Negation and Flare of Denial to control the opponent's game plan. The inclusion of cards like Endurance and Ice-Fang Coatl helps with creature matchups, while Thundertrap Trainer provides additional pressure. The overall strategy is to tempo out the opponent and maintain board control.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quick and aggressive plays to overwhelm the opponent. It utilizes efficient creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls, backed up by powerful spells like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Seasoned Pyromancer. The deck also includes removal options like Solitude and Galvanic Discharge to maintain board control. Additionally, cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Voice of Victory provide additional support and aggression. The inclusion of cards like Blood Moon and Goblin Bombardment can disrupt the opponent's game plan, while Arena of Glory can provide additional value and resilience.

The deck focuses on using a combination of instant reanimator spells like Goryo's Vengeance and Ephemerate to quickly bring back powerful creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier or Griselbrand from the graveyard. The deck also includes disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Force of Negation to control the game and protect its combo pieces. By utilizing cards like Psychic Frog and Quantum Riddler for card advantage, the deck aims to quickly assemble its combo and overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats, while also having access to removal spells like Prismatic Ending to deal with opposing threats.

The deck focuses on quickly deploying artifacts with low casting costs to gain advantage and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. It utilizes cards like Memnite and Mishra's Bauble to quickly cast powerful artifact creatures like Pinnacle Emissary and Kappa Cannoneer. The deck also includes cards like Urza's Saga and Emry, Lurker of the Loch to provide additional value and card advantage. By combining artifact synergy with aggressive plays, the deck aims to quickly close out games and outpace the opponent in a fast-paced Modern format.

The deck focuses on quickly milling the opponent's library using cards like Hedron Crab, Ruin Crab, and Archive Trap, while also disrupting their game plan with cards like Surgical Extraction and Extirpate. Snapcaster Mage provides versatility by flashing back important spells, while Jace, the Perfected Mind acts as a backup win condition. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Drown in the Loch to control the board, as well as card draw spells like Visions of Beyond to keep the deck running smoothly. The mana base is built to support the deck's strategy with multiple fetchlands and utility lands.

This deck focuses on aggressive plays, utilizing a mix of creatures with varying abilities and powerful spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The key strategy is to establish a strong board presence early on with efficient creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Territorial Kavu, while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Stubborn Denial and Leyline Binding. Combining efficient creatures with disruptive spells and powerful finishers like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Scion of Draco, this deck aims to put pressure on the opponent and secure a quick victory.

This deck focuses on fast, aggressive plays and control elements to disrupt the opponent's game plan. By using powerful creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Territorial Kavu, as well as spells like Lightning Bolt and Stubborn Denial, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain control of the board. Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding provide additional support, while Arena of Glory offers a way to further dominate the battlefield. Overall, the deck seeks to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of speed, power, and disruption.

This deck revolves around ramping up mana quickly and efficiently to bring out Primeval Titan and Amulet of Vigor to achieve explosive combos. The key strategy involves utilizing cards like Arboreal Grazer and Urza's Saga to accelerate mana production, while also utilizing land search cards like Green Sun's Zenith and Tolaria West to find key pieces. By assembling the right combination of lands and creatures, the deck can generate massive amounts of mana and pull off game-winning plays with cards like Scapeshift and Malevolent Rumble.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying aggressive creatures while disrupting the opponent's game plan with taxing effects. By combining powerful threats like Ragavan and Phage with disruptive cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Solitude, the deck aims to apply pressure early and control the board. The deck also includes various removal spells and utility cards to handle different threats and situations. Additionally, the inclusion of Fable of the Mirror-Breaker provides a combo finisher for closing out games quickly and decisively.

The deck focuses on playing artifacts quickly and efficiently to increase board presence and generate card advantage through cards like Mishra's Bauble and Thoughtcast. It aims to control the game through counterspells like Metallic Rebuke and removal like Engineered Explosives, while also applying pressure with cards like Arcbound Ravager and Pinnacle Emissary. Urza's Saga is a key piece of the strategy, helping to find crucial artifacts like Shadowspear and Weapon's Manufacturing to close out the game quickly. The deck excels at building a strong board presence and overwhelming opponents with its aggressive plays.

This deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with powerful creatures, then bringing them back onto the battlefield for a devastating combo. Using cards like Faithless Looting and Persist to enable graveyard shenanigans, it aims to reanimate creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Emperor of Bones to overwhelm the opponent. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Psychic Frog provide card advantage and control elements, while Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer helps generate additional resources. The deck also includes disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to deal with threats and protect the combo.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on employing cheap and efficient creatures like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Monastery Swiftspear alongside burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart to quickly overwhelm the opponent. Mishra's Bauble and Slickshot Show-Off help with card selection and tempo advantage, while cards like Mutagenic Growth and Violent Urge provide combat tricks and additional damage potential. The deck also includes disruption with Surgical Extraction and Cori-Steel Cutter to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The mana base is streamlined to support a fast and aggressive game plan.

This deck focuses on utilizing a variety of creatures with toolbox abilities to create a powerful combo strategy. By tutoring for specific creatures with cards like Green Sun's Zenith and Agatha's Soul Cauldron, the deck can assemble the necessary pieces to achieve victory. With support from cards like Yawgmoth, Thran Physician and Walking Ballista, the deck can control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The inclusion of Grist, the Hunger Tide and Malevolent Rumble adds additional versatility and power to the deck's overall strategy.
